sources.title: Cry Danger
sources.description: Title: Cry Danger Summary: Ex-con Rocky Mulloy seeks the real culprit in the crime he was framed for, in a night world of deceptive dames and double crosses. Directed by: Robert Parrish Actors: Dick Powell, Rhonda Fleming, Richard Erdman Production Company: Olympic Productions Inc. Release Date: 23 February 1951 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Rocky Mulloy, back in town after serving 5 years of a life sentence for armed robbery, hopes to clear his friend Danny Morgan who's still in prison for the same crime. It won't be easy. Even the witness who cleared Rocky thinks he's guilty; Danny's glamorous wife Nancy, living in a sleazy trailer court, seems lukewarm about getting Danny back; cynical cop Gus Cobb just wants to stir things up in hopes that the missing "hot" $100,000 will surface. Plenty of tough talk, night scenes, deceptive dames and double crosses in this typical film noir.

Cry Danger (1951) Dick Powell, Rhonda Fleming, William Conrad, Jean Porter
sources.description: Cry Danger is a 1951 FILM NOlR thriller film, starring Dick Powell and Rhonda Fleming, William Conrad and Jean Porter. The film was directed by Robert Parrish, a former child star and later editor in his debut as a director.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia . There is also a good review of the movie here from the movie blog D for Doom .
